Package org.opencastproject.workflow.remote

Class WorkflowServiceRemoteImpl

java.lang.Object
org.opencastproject.serviceregistry.api.RemoteBase
org.opencastproject.workflow.remote.WorkflowServiceRemoteImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowService
public class WorkflowServiceRemoteImpl extends org.opencastproject.serviceregistry.api.RemoteBase implements org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowService
An implementation of the workflow service that communicates with a remote workflow service via HTTP.
